name: Sleeper
text: By seeking solace in the grave, you are able to recuperate more quickly.
benefit: You heal 1 hit point per 10 minutes as long as you are surrounded by at least 5 feet of dirt or stone on all sides and take no actions.
text_zh: 找一个土坑躺下，你可以获得更快的恢复速度。
benefit_zh: 只要你的周围包围着至少5尺泥土或石头且不进行任何动作，你就可以每10分钟恢复1点生命值。
